content: a rocky-inspired lightweight cap in rib decreases form a cross on the crown on one side cap is reversible and it s long enough for various styles of folding knit in soft fine yarn it s very warm and skin-friendly any light fingering to light sport weight wool will make a soft pliable hat **31 march 2009 ** *please note that i have rewritten the pattern and added a chart to help with the decreases be sure to download the latest version of the pattern as it is more exact * **nov 2017 ** *updated to ulla magazine *
